## Builder.custom() method

Adds a description text

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
custom(label: string, text: string, opts?: Partial<CustomModel>): CustomModel & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  label | string | The control label |
|  text | string | The text message |
|  opts | Partial&lt;[CustomModel](./tweak-ui.custommodel.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Additional options for the control |

<b>Returns:</b>

[CustomModel](./tweak-ui.custommodel.md) &amp; [Removable](./tweak-ui.removable.md)
